availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Paymaster Department of the Executive Branch of the Kentucky State Government. Paymaster Generals: Colonel J. B. Temple (September 6, 1862 to August 31, 1863); Colonel William T. Scott (Appointed September 2, 1863). Assistant Paymaster General: Major M. Scott Dudley (Appointed April 1, 1865).

ab.bibl:
"Obituary: The Late Colonel William T. Scott," Louisville Courier-Journal, January 9, 1875, https://search.proquest.com/docview/1119523568?accountid=11926 (accessed August 29, 2019).
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. 1 (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), vii.
